# List of presidents of the Examination Yuan__disambig_1

| succession =
| inaugural = Dai Jitao
| website = http://intro.exam.gov.tw/enggtm/gtm-index.htm
| imagesize = 190px
}}
The president of the Examination Yuan is the head of the Examination Yuan, a constitutional branch of the Republic of China.
List

|Kuomintang (Nationalist)|border=1px solid #AAAAAA}}
|Democratic Progressive Party|border=1px solid #AAAAAA}}
